short_summary: Supply, delivery, warranty, installation and training of a device capable of shredding, disintegrating and grinding all types of IT storage media that has a protection level of Secret.

**Notice Details**
---

The Government of Canada has released a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply, delivery, warranty, installation, and training of an optical and IT mixed media destruction device with a protection level of Secret. The scope of the work includes:
